I wore this for the first time last Friday (it had been hanging in my closet for quite some time.)  It was for a concert I gave outdoors, and it just felt amazing!  It was comfy, it fit very well, it wasn't itchy, and it held its shape.  Too, it washed like a dream (I washed it, cold-cycle, in a King-sized pillow case, then hung it on a hanger, not putting it in the dryer at all), and I literally can NOT find a single flaw in this beautiful top.  If you want to feel good about yourself, and at nearly 70, that has become increasingly rare, this is the top to purchase!  I was SO impressed with the quality of the stitching, that none of the sequins were "wonky" or that caught on anything...it was a dream.  Excellent product!  Thanks so much!

I like how Amazon is flagging items that have a high return rate.  This is a beautiful top and wellmade.  But, the measurements are not a great way to see if this item fits.  The bust measurement works but it is the abdomen and the rib cage that needs to be listed.  It fits through the top well, but overly tight around the lower ribs, abdomen, and stomach.  I hate to return this, but I am hesitant to keep upsizing and have the bust area not fit correctly.
